turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. I'd like to order a pizza, some or actually a few pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me place the order for you. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two pizzas both medium. One is just a straight barbecue chicken pizza and the other will be pepperoni, mushrooms, onions, and bell peppers and both need to have cheeses as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. your order for 2 medium pizzas, 1 bbq chicken, and 1 with pepperoni, mushrooms, onions, and bell peppers, both with extra cheese comes out to $28.93

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order for pick up now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else from me?
